angered.stormvaettr: %s: I am a vaettr of storms and you have desecrated that which belongs to me! Prepare to feel the thunder of my wrath!
angered.landvaettr: %s: I am a vaettr of the earth and you have desecrated my lands! Prepare to feel my wrath!
message.magicdeath.fromnone: %1$s was killed by the power of magic!
message.magicdeath.fromwiz: %1$s was killed by %2$s using the power of magic!
